ctx: Kateri SATA disk za prenosnika-poceni in zanesljiv
content:
Ker sem tisto s prvotno temo resil... so se javili na telefon pri solo.si, imam naslednji problem:


Ocitno mi je na MacBooku crknil disk. Garancija je itak eno leto, prenosnik pa leto in pol.  
	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	




Torej, potreboval bi nov disk, ker je pa minilo vsaj pet let od mojega zadnjega nakupa diska vec ne vem kaj je kul in kaj ne. Ne potrebujem 500GB, lahko je tudi 120-250GB, bom cist zadovoljen. Do sedaj je bil notri Hitachi HTS541690J9SA00. Kupim spet Hitachija ali raje pogledam kaj drugega? WD? Seagate? Samsung? Al je vse isti drek, ce crkne zamenjas v garanciji... 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	




Hvala.
author: Dacho

ctx: Kateri SATA disk za prenosnika-poceni in zanesljiv
content:
Pri 5400 si oglej WD Scorpio:

WD's new 320 GB Scorpio drive is more extreme than the Samsung and the Toshiba drives. It has the highest power requirements of all the 2.5" notebook hard drives you can find in our charts, but it also offers very good performance, beating many of the 7,200 RPM hard drives as well as Toshiba's offering. The drive is also quicker than the Samsung SpinPoint M6 when it comes to access time, I/O performance and the PCMark05 application benchmark, which gauges Windows XP startup performance and performance while writing files that are being copied. While the difference is tiny, WD's new Scorpio is not fast enough to beat the Samsung drive's data transfer rates that are as fast as 70 MB/s. This shouldn't be an issue, though, as the drive's overall performance is very much on par against the others.

320Gb verzija stane cca 75EUR
author: eazy

ctx: Kateri SATA disk za prenosnika-poceni in zanesljiv
content: Če hočeš imeti disk za dolgo časa, potem poglej malo za SSD diski. Pa še niso občutljivi na prenašanje, oziroma premikanje računalnika med delom.
author: Stupo

ctx: Kateri SATA disk za prenosnika-poceni in zanesljiv
content:
Si pa hiter z odgovorom. 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


 
Disk je že zdavnaj kupljen in v prenosniku. Dela bp, pa še 3-letno garancijo ima. Tako da imam mir.
author: Dacho

ctx: Kateri SATA disk za prenosnika-poceni in zanesljiv
content: Za katerega si se pa odločil?
author: Stupo

ctx: Kateri SATA disk za prenosnika-poceni in zanesljiv
content: Vzel sem WD Scorpio 160GB, je bil najcenejsi med tistimi, ki so bili na zalogi in dobavljivi isti dan. Pa se 3l garancija, za zeno cisto dovolj, itak imam se 320 GB MyBook na mizi.
author: Dacho
